name: Paul Johnston - @home / needing a new hobby

content.value:
What's the best (pref UK) WordPress managed hosting?

We have 2 websites that we've been quoted a *lot* for managed hosting renewal, and I just want to find an alternative. It also seems a long way out of date in terms of WP version. 

"Ours" as a response will be ignored.
content.html: What's the best (pref UK) WordPress managed hosting? We have 2 websites that we've been quoted a *lot* for managed hosting renewal, and I just want to find an alternative. It also seems a long way out of date in terms of WP version. "Ours" as a response will be ignored.
